name: Aba aba
description:
Play as tiny invaders into a poor human being's laptop, and input correct letters to leave. But apparently, you're not the only group of vandals — a cat is trying to defend (destroy) the laptop too!

Be careful of hints since we're not allowed to give explicit instructions, while there are real puzzles  :-)
Just remember, this is a honest keyboard.

 

________________________________________________

Well, if you do get stuck, here's some help:

  • You'll always have to leave to the next scene with your fellow “jelly” picked up using an up arrow.
  • You can also put it down by hitting the down arrow.
  • Stand on a platform and hit "enter" on your keyboard, the platform will function as a key.
  • Stay away from the cat — it's not so scary though.
